hi everyone, 
I am currently trying to apply timeseries prediction to the r=
tNEAT c++ package, to compare its search performance to a fixed-size, evolv=
ing topology recurrent neural net I wrote.

I have written a custom experim=
ents.h/cpp file to cycle through the activate() function for every time ste=
p, after loading an array of ~75 sensor inputs.

So while I understand how =
to load the inputs and retrieve the outputs, I don't quite understand how I=
 am supposed to tell NEAT how many inputs and outputs there are. after all,=
 that array I'm passing to load_sensor is nothing more than a pointer to a =
value.

so where do I tell NEAT how many inputs I will give each net, and h=
ow many outputs I will be expecting? (in my RNN the outputs were simply the=
 last x neurons, but the inputs do need to be defined).

thanks in advance =
for the help!
